players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think the mafia killed Charlie. I suspect Alice might be the mafia."
You: "I think Bob is the mafia. He was the one who pointed at me."
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Bob, you also suspect her. Let’s vote Alice."
You: "I think Diana is the mafia; she’s too eager to convict me and is the only one who knows my role. Bob is just a villager."
Bob: "Diana claims to have investigated Alice. Alice says Diana is mafia. If Alice were mafia, she'd lie. If Diana were mafia, she'd lie about investigation. Vote Alice."
Diana: "I am the detective, I investigated Alice and found her mafia. Alice, your claims are false. Vote Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think the mafia killed Charlie. I suspect Alice might be the mafia."
Alice: "I think Bob is the mafia. He was the one who pointed at me."
Diana: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Bob, you also suspect her. Let’s vote Alice."
Alice: "I think Diana is the mafia; she’s too eager to convict me and is the only one who knows my role. Bob is just a villager."
You: "Diana claims to have investigated Alice. Alice says Diana is mafia. If Alice were mafia, she'd lie. If Diana were mafia, she'd lie about investigation. Vote Alice."
Diana: "I am the detective, I investigated Alice and found her mafia. Alice, your claims are false. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
